title: CHERRY VANILLA DARK CHOCOLATE OVERNIGHT OATS
directions: Whisk together the Greek yogurt, milk, maple syrup and vanilla in a bowl.
Add in the remaining ingredients and stir together until combined.
Divide the mixture evenly into two jars and cover with lids.
Refrigerate overnight. Oats are good for several days.
ingredients: 2/3 cup unsweetened almond milk or milk of choice
